articles.description: Tight home-Test schedule of six games in eight weeks lies ahead, with questions over red-ball preparation to boot
articles.content: Australia are set to play six matches in fewer than eight weeks next summer, after a gap of 312 days since their last assignment against India in January, meaning an idling Test team will have to re-… [+5076 chars]
